CustomField.formula:
IF( CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"GC") ||CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"GE") ||CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"GA") ||CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"GV") ||CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"OG") ||CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"GW") ||CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"GF") ||CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"GU") ||CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"GZ"), "Group Booking",
IF( CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"FI") ||CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"FB"), "FIP Booking",
IF( CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"FG") ||CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"SV"), "Staff Voucher Booking",
IF( CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"FE") ||CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"PL"), "PALS Booking",
IF( CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"TE") ||CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"TF") ||CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"TP"), "Duty Booking",
IF( CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"YD") ||CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"WC"), "Wheelchair Booking",
IF( CONTAINS(PAX_Type__c,"BP"), "Guide Dog Booking",
IF( CONTAINS(FBC__c,"BGENOVSB"), "SNAP Booking",
"Standard Passenger"
) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: PAX Type Description
